title: StudioStyleGuideColor

name: StudioStyleGuideColor
type: enum
summary: ''
description: ''

items:
  - name: MainBackground
    summary: |
      The primary background color used by the toolbar and windows.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Titlebar
    summary: |
      The color of windows' title bars.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Dropdown
    summary: |
      The color of dropdown menus, like those found in the Properties window.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Tooltip
    summary: |
      The background color of tooltips, like those seen when hovering over

    deprecationmessage: ''
